section.heading: Mandatory reporting.
section.text: Beginning in 2011, on or before September 30 of each year, the Office of the State Superintendent of Education shall report to the Mayor, the Council, and the Healthy Schools and Youth Commission annually regarding:

para.text: Compliance of public schools and public charter schools with the physical and health education requirements in this subchapter; and
Student achievement with respect to health and physical education standards.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-240: § 3 of D.C. Law 22-240 provided that the change made to this section by § 2(s) of D.C. Law 22-240 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
